project.name: creational.factory.pcp
project.description:
We would like to implement the well-known producer-consumer problem in Java. There is a Company that has some Storages. Each Storage can contain different kind of Products.
Producers add products to a storage. Consumers withdraw products from a storage.
Limitation - Company is shared among Producers and Consumers. - There is a fix number of Storages - Product type should be enum. - Producers and Consumers should run in Threads.
